data.eml:eml: One new species and records of Ichthydium Ehrenberg, 1830 (Gastrotricha: Chaetonotida) from Sweden with a key to the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kånneby, Tobias, Todaro, Antonio, Jondelius, Ulf (2009): One new species and records of Ichthydium Ehrenberg, 1830 (Gastrotricha: Chaetonotida) from Sweden with a key to the genus. Zootaxa 2278: 26-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191157
